extendedInfo.description: This is an app which displays the politics.ie site optimised for mobiles on your android device.If you want to keep up with current events or politics in Ireland then you will find this app useful.This app wraps it in its own webview and displays it in your launcher menu for easy access.You can use the contact developer link at the bottom of the site if you would like a mobile app for your own site.

reviews.comment: Good app does the job I want and need it to do. Works perfectly on my HTC DESIRE X & SAMSUNG TAB 2 If the developers are looking at other apps may I suggest RIP.ie which must be one of the most visited sites in Ireland.
reviews.author: philip harrington

reviews.title: Hmmmm
reviews.comment: When selecting a page, I\'m sometimes get a blank page with \'File does not exist\'...so back to browser for me....
reviews.author: David Lynch

reviews.title: Decent
reviews.comment: Good for what it does. Fair play to the app developer for doing this. Cheers.
reviews.author: pat murphy

reviews.title: Works
reviews.comment: It definitely does because I tested it before I upload it.
reviews.author: Brian Maher
